top_categories.workout_context: Iowa State Gravel TT Championship's Iowa rolling, State championship forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 40 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Iowa State Gravel TT Championship's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before September.
When someone attacks on Iowa rolling gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
Iowa State Gravel TT Championship's Iowa rolling gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Iowa State Gravel TT Championship, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
At Iowa State Gravel TT Championship, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
40 miles on Iowa rolling gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Iowa State Gravel TT Championship. Train it until it feels boring.
2-minute all-out efforts on Iowa rolling gravel. Closing gaps, responding to attacks, sprinting for position. Train the burn.
Varied gradients on Iowa rolling gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
Smooth pedaling at 40 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.
Base fitness for Iowa State Gravel TT Championship. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Iowa State Gravel TT Championship’s 40 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Iowa State Gravel TT Championship requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on iowa rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: iowa rolling, state championship, midwest gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and VO2max to prepare you for 40 miles of iowa rolling gravel in Amana, Iowa.
